title: Visual RPG Studio v1.98.34 Lite - Game Engine
description:
Core Features 
 -Custom Collision
 -Visual Lua Scripting
 -Supports Xbox 360 Controller
 -Premade Custom Interfaces
 -Customizable Workspace
 -Project Templates
 -Easy Multilingual Deployment
 -Doublex64 Bit Encrypted Resources
 -Auto Updater
 -User Interface Editor

2D Features
 -Large Maps
 -1 to 10 Layers
 -Unlimited Tile-sets
 -Unlimited Animated Tiles
 -Built-in Animation Tools

3D Features
 -Large Maps
 -Dynamic Shadows
 -Blended Terrain

(Engine has full feature 30 day trial)
